FlavorTextOption.Text: There is something wrong here... something which makes my sheath retract and my talons ooze. I sense the ugliness of a thousand evil thoughts and I have located the source of these fetid emanations. They come from aboard one of your vessels! Foolish renegade [LISTENING_RACE_LEADER], why have you come here? All that you have found is your inevitable punishment.

We sense... something... something ancient... a sickly smell... a chilling wind. My ancestors scream from within their chambers in my mind but I cannot understand their words. This feeling... a memory? It sickens us. We are the Ur-Quan Kohr-Ah. Your presence here is premature. Our nature, the fulfillment of our fate requires your destruction.
